column4: I'm thinking so too, especially as only 2 resolutions in there
well, 1024x768 should work on any monitor bought in this millenium I should think
According to http://support.dell.com/support/edocs/monitors/m990/En/spec/spec.htm   this monitor will do 1024x768 at 75 or 85 refresh but no other refresh rates listed for this resolution
that seems to be the correct specs indeed, and the horizsync and vertrefresh values are correct, so that configuration should work ...
